title: Full-Stack Freelancing
description: Create high-quality frontend and backend applications built with modern technologies, best practices, top performance, and best UI & UX.
features: 2 months support for bug fixes after delivery

title: Frontend Consulting
description: Expert guidance on frontend architecture, performance, and best practices.

title: AI Fluency & AI Integration Workshop
description: A hands-on and immediately applicable program where teams and individuals learn advanced AI integration and prompt engineering techniques that save hours every week.
features: Tool-stack guidance and an AI-first mindset
Prompt engineering techniques and prompt libraries
Role-tailored examples for Engineering, Product, Design, Marketing, Data, HR, and more
Remote by default; onsite available on request
prerequisites: Basic familiarity with technical terms like terminal, API, frontend/backend

title: Frontend Development Mentoring
description: Personalized mentoring program to accelerate your frontend development career from beginner to senior level.
prerequisites: English B1 level or higher(equivalent to IELTS 5.5)

title: Technical Product Management Mentoring
description: Comprehensive technical knowledge base program for product managers to effectively collaborate with engineering teams and make informed technical decisions.
features: Technical SEO fundamentals (Core web vitals, Meta tags, Sitemap)
prerequisites: English B1 level or higher (equivalent to IELTS 5.5)
Basic understanding of the software development lifecycle
Product management or a similar experience
